name: Hiding Your True Self
description:
Hiding Your True Self  by Johan Rodriguez

Description:

A 3D on-rails game highlighting the fear of being your authentic self that the LGBTQ+ community faces every day walking in conservative areas by having the player alter their physical appearance through color changes to reach their destination safely

Credits:

City Package by 255 pixel studios. https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/city-package-107224

Base Code by Michael Baker
